vulnerabilities: Use of Incorrectly-Resolved Name or Reference
description: The function is vulnerable to path traversal attacks (CWE-22) because it uses user-supplied input in 'header.linkname' to construct a file path without proper sanitization. This could allow an attacker to access, modify, or delete files outside of the intended directory. Additionally, the function may be vulnerable to use of incorrectly-resolved name or reference (CWE-706) because it does not check if 'srcpath' is a valid file before attempting to create a link or read stream. This could lead to unexpected behavior or errors.
